events.message: I placed my order two weeks ago but it still hasn't arrived. The tracking information hasn't been updated for several days, and I'm concerned about the delay.
The issue has been identified as related to delivery delay due to the customer's report of late shipping and inactive tracking updates.
The case has been assigned to delivery support team member James to assist with shipping status.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand your order hasn't arrived yet, and I'm here to help investigate this issue for you.
Could you please provide your order number and the delivery address so I can track the shipment and provide you with an update?
Sure, the order number is 123456789 and the delivery address is 45 Maple Street, Springfield, 12345.
I have checked with the courier service and found that the package was delayed due to weather conditions. It is now scheduled to be delivered within the next three days.
Thank you for the update. I appreciate the explanation and hope it arrives soon.
We have confirmed that your package was delivered today. Please check your doorstep or with neighbors if you haven't received it yet.
We wanted to follow up and ensure that you have received your order and everything is satisfactory. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
Since there have been no further issues reported, we are closing this case. Thank you for your patience and understanding.
